actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-583.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 345) revising the congressional budget for the United States Government for the fiscal year 1982 and setting forth the congressional budget for the United States Government for the fiscal years 1983, 1984, and 1985.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H. Con. Res. 345 (Congressional budget).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 345) revising the congressional budget for the United States Government for the fiscal year 1982 and setting forth the congressional budget for the United States Government for the fiscal years 1983, 1984, and 1985.
